title_text: And so the Adventure Begins!
summary_text: After dying of shock from being hit by a slow-moving tractor, Kazuma Satou was given another chance at life in a new world by the goddess Aqua. He sometimes thinks back to their meeting...

title_text: An Adventure with This New Party! - P1
summary_text: After many trials with his eccentric party, it seemed Kazuma was a true adventurer at last. Or so he thought...

title_text: An Adventure with This New Party! - P2
summary_text: The ill-fated Kazuma found himself facing yet another mountain of debt. With no choice but to risk life and limb in deadly quests, he began searching for promising new party members.

title_text: An Adventure with This New Party! - P3
summary_text: Enter Lia, Cielo, and Erika, a three-girl squad whose dainty exteriors hide some rather unusual quirks...

title_text: An Adventure with This New Party! - P4
summary_text: Hoping to see if the trio could hold their own in the field, Kazuma and company headed for a dungeon...where they immediately fell into a trap.

title_text: An Adventure with This New Party! - P5
summary_text: The party continued their advance, chancing upon a rare gem. Were more valuable baubles waiting to be uncovered?

title_text: An Adventure with This New Party! - P6
summary_text: With the quest safely behind them, the gang took in their first Axel Hearts show, which spurred Kazuma to concoct a plan...

title_text: A New Deal for These Dancers! - P1
summary_text: Kazuma was dead set on turning Lia, Cielo, and Erika into genuine idols. The first order of business: making a ton of idol-related merch, glow sticks and all.

title_text: A New Deal for These Dancers! - P2
summary_text: The dancing trio all lived under the same roof. Hoping to wake the slumbering Lia, Kazuma entered her room to find...

title_text: A New Deal for These Dancers! - P3
summary_text: On Megumin's advice, Axel Hearts were booked to tour the Crimson Demon Village, making Kazuma a full-fledged producer.

title_text: A New Deal for These Dancers! - P4
summary_text: The next show for Axel Hearts was set for the cerulean burg of Arcanretia. But would they first be able to survive the storm of Axis fanatics?

title_text: A New Deal for These Dancers! - P5
summary_text: Iris gladly agreed to hold an Axel Hearts show in the royal capital. This was to be the squad's big break, were it not for one unexpected obstacle...

title_text: A New Deal for These Dancers! - P6
summary_text: Kazuma's plan achieved the opposite effect, increasing the squad's already staggering debt. Compounding the situation was an ominous figure in the shadows...

title_text: A Break-In at This Impregnable Vault! - P1
summary_text: The debt-ridden Kazuma was in a slump, without even the will to take on quests. It was then that a girl appeared at the tavern, as beautiful as she was mysterious...

title_text: A Break-In at This Impregnable Vault! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma was hot on the trail of Melissa, treasure hunter extraordinaire. Would his plan to team up with her and hit the jackpot succeed?

title_text: A Break-In at This Impregnable Vault! - P3
summary_text: It appeared Melissa would fall head over heels for all types of furry fauna. Kazuma devised a scheme to win her over, using Chomusuke as bait...

title_text: A Break-In at This Impregnable Vault! - P4
summary_text: Kazuma and friends, along with Melissa, set off for the kingdom of Elroad. If they were to find the treasure, a party meeting was in order...

title_text: A Break-In at This Impregnable Vault! - P5
summary_text: The gang had the vault in their sights...but a hostile presence had them in its sights. It was then that Melissa came up with a plan...

title_text: A Break-In at This Impregnable Vault! - P6
summary_text: Kazuma and his allies had at last obtained the treasure they sought. But before the gang could split it, Melissa uttered something shocking.

title_text: Selling Vegetables with These Two Beastmen! - P1
summary_text: Another day of construction work behind them, Kazuma and Aqua encountered two beastmen on their weary trudge home.

title_text: Selling Vegetables with These Two Beastmen! - P2
summary_text: Our heroes set course for Amy and Mia's northern homeland. On the way, the tinier of the two beastmen spotted some snow sprites, rousing her mischievous nature.

title_text: Selling Vegetables with These Two Beastmen! - P3
summary_text: Kazuma once again met a grisly end at the hands of the Winter Shogun. Though Aqua attempted to revive him, the sulking Kazuma resisted.

title_text: Selling Vegetables with These Two Beastmen! - P4
summary_text: At long last, the gang had reached their destination...only to find the village's crops had failed. Not willing to give up, Kazuma staked his savings on a plan.

title_text: Selling Vegetables with These Two Beastmen! - P5
summary_text: The vegetables sold like hotcakes, strengthening the newfound friendship with the beastmen. It was then that Amy revealed the reason for her protective nature.

title_text: Selling Vegetables with These Two Beastmen! - P6
summary_text: Charlie retreated after being defeated by the gang for a second time, uttering a name which caught Wiz's attention.

title_text: Join This Prestigious Dance Contest! - P1
summary_text: More desperate and debt-ridden than ever, Kazuma's attention was thoroughly piqued by Dust's mention of a dance competition.

title_text: Join This Prestigious Dance Contest! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma's sights were firmly set on the contest's cash prize. Hoping to gain Lia and company's cooperation, he offered a proposal.

title_text: Join This Prestigious Dance Contest! - P3
summary_text: The Axel Hearts girls were gunning for first place, practicing day and night. Now all they had to do was qualify.

title_text: Join This Prestigious Dance Contest! - P4
summary_text: The group's hard work paid off, as they passed the first round. While Kazuma showered the trio with praise, they readied themselves for their next trial.

title_text: Join This Prestigious Dance Contest! - P5
summary_text: Next up was the second round. As the trio stood by backstage, it was clear they weren't their usual selves.

title_text: Join This Prestigious Dance Contest! - P6
summary_text: Though Kazuma and party scrambled to intercept Daniel, his power proved too much for them. Would the girls be able to evade his sinister clutches?

title_text: Attack the Troll Lord's Castle! - P1
summary_text: As Daniel's prisoners, Aqua and Lia spent their days confined to his castle. Meanwhile, Kazuma and the gang plotted their next move.

title_text: Attack the Troll Lord's Castle! - P2
summary_text: As Kazuma and his party began their daring rescue attempt, Lia revealed a stunning truth to Aqua back at the castle.

title_text: Attack the Troll Lord's Castle! - P3
summary_text: Our heroes reached the castle, as its owner was busy preparing a ritual to restore a dreaded ancient weapon.

title_text: Attack the Troll Lord's Castle! - P4
summary_text: With Charlie left defeated in their wake, our heroes made it to Aqua and Lia's quarters. Beyond the door, however, was a sight they were not prepared for.

title_text: Attack the Troll Lord's Castle! - P5
summary_text: On Melissa's request, the party opted to rummage through Daniel's treasure coffers before making their escape. Unfortunately for them, the villain himself was preparing to strike.

title_text: Attack the Troll Lord's Castle! - P6
summary_text: In the fierce battle that ensued, Kazuma's party seemed to have the upper hand...spurring Daniel to unleash his troll form. Would our heroes be able to stop the return of the ancient weapon?

title_text: Exploration in This Land of Snow! - P1
summary_text: Thor's Hammer can control lightning, but while everyone else feared it, Megumin found herself captivated...

title_text: Exploration in This Land of Snow! - P2
summary_text: After returning to Axel, Kazuma gathered the adventurers at the guild to explain the threat of Thor's Hammer and formulate a plan...

title_text: Exploration in This Land of Snow! - P3
summary_text: The special gauntlets Járngreipr are the only way to wield Thor's Hammer. Kazuma and company set out to find them...

title_text: Exploration in This Land of Snow! - P4
summary_text: The group climbed Mount Worm in search of Járngreipr, but their companion Mitsurugi was forced to confront Daniel, who has given chase...

title_text: Exploration in This Land of Snow! - P5
summary_text: Mount Worm was crawling with wild vegetables. They attacked once the group, now joined by Lia, reached the summit...

title_text: Exploration in This Land of Snow! - P6
summary_text: Mia managed to calm the muskmelon leader, but Daniel used the opportunity to nab Járngreipr...

title_text: A Swift Escape from This Predicament! - P1
summary_text: After apparently regaining her memories during the quest on Mount Worm, Lia locked herself in her room and refused to come out...

title_text: A Swift Escape from This Predicament! - P2
summary_text: Lia is from Japan, just like Kazuma! She went on to explain the reason for her recent aloofness to her shocked companions...

title_text: A Swift Escape from This Predicament! - P3
summary_text: Someone from Erika's past appeared just as Axel Hearts were gearing up for the dance contest...

title_text: A Swift Escape from This Predicament! - P4
summary_text: Axel Hearts have lost their costumes! Faced with such a devastating theft, Melissa, Mia, and Amy join in the search...

title_text: A Swift Escape from This Predicament! - P5
summary_text: Axel Hearts won the first round of the contest. That night, Kazuma learned of the special item Lia brought with her to her new life...

title_text: A Swift Escape from This Predicament! - P6
summary_text: Kazuma and company fought off Daniel's attack on the capital, but he responded by unleashing the power of Thor's Hammer...

title_text: A Final Battle for This Newbie Town! - P1
summary_text: Thor's Hammer wreaked havoc on the beautiful capital. In the midst of the chaos, Kazuma received an unexpected visitor...

title_text: A Final Battle for This Newbie Town! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma's cries of innocence fell on deaf ears as he was taken back to prison, where his friends came to visit him once again...

title_text: A Final Battle for This Newbie Town! - P3
summary_text: Is Lia leaving Axel Hearts?! When Kazuma heard this sudden news, he rushed back to the dancers to talk to Lia...

title_text: A Final Battle for This Newbie Town! - P4
summary_text: Kazuma gathered his friends in an effort to stop Daniel and Thor's Hammer...minus the recently-disbanded Axel Hearts...

title_text: A Final Battle for This Newbie Town! - P5
summary_text: Daniel and his trolls launched their attack on Axel, but Kazuma's party was ready to bring an end to this battle!

title_text: A Final Battle for This Newbie Town! - P6
summary_text: Lia used her magical keyboard to protect against Daniel's lightning, but who would save them once its power ran out?

title_text: A Grand Finale for This Contest! - P1
summary_text: A few days after Daniel's attack on Axel, Kazuma was boasting about finally paying off his debt, but...

title_text: A Grand Finale for This Contest! - P2
summary_text: As the dance contest drew near, an unexpected visitor approached Kazuma while he was giving the dancers a pep talk...

title_text: A Grand Finale for This Contest! - P3
summary_text: The day of the contest finals arrived. As the event heated up, Kazuma and friends learned something shocking...

title_text: A Grand Finale for This Contest! - P4
summary_text: Excitement rippled through the arena as the overwhelming presence of Explosion Goddess Lalatina took to the stage!

title_text: A Grand Finale for This Contest! - P5
summary_text: The last group to perform was the talk of the show, Axel Hearts. However, that was the moment that Daniel chose to return...

title_text: A Grand Finale for This Contest! - P6
summary_text: Who would win the contest? Would the conflict with Daniel end? The long battle finally approached its conclusion...

title_text: Gratitude for This Wonderful Person! - P1
summary_text: Offers begin to pour in after Axel Hearts won the contest. Meanwhile, Kazuma's party set out on a quest as things finally returned to normal...

title_text: Gratitude for This Wonderful Person! - P2
summary_text: Axel Hearts wanted to thank Kazuma for being their producer, so they began to ask around to figure out what to give him...

title_text: Gratitude for This Wonderful Person! - P3
summary_text: Axel Hearts asked many people what present would make Kazuma happy, but someone was watching them from the shadows...

title_text: Gratitude for This Wonderful Person! - P4
summary_text: Axel Hearts headed to the Crimson Demon Village to get more ideas for Kazuma's gift, but the advice they received was suspect at best...

title_text: Gratitude for This Wonderful Person! - P5
summary_text: Kazuma was shocked to hear he may lose his role as producer. Meanwhile, Yunyun brought Axel Hearts to a forest near the village...

title_text: Gratitude for This Wonderful Person! - P6
summary_text: Axel Hearts paid a visit to the sulking Kazuma. Would their gift manage to restore his spirits?

title_text: A Bailout for These Beastmen! - P1
summary_text: With Daniel defeated, peace returns to Axel. And Kazuma returns to his get-rich-quick schemes.

title_text: A Bailout for These Beastmen! - P2
summary_text: The stage for Kazuma's latest scheme is the village of Samuidoh, but how will he respond to the demon Vanir's contract demands?

title_text: A Bailout for These Beastmen! - P3
summary_text: Amy and Mia report strange things afoot in Samuidoh, sending Kazuma and the gang north to investigate.

title_text: A Bailout for These Beastmen! - P4
summary_text: Samuidoh is hit with a massive cold wave, causing an endless blizzard. Kazuma and crew speak with the mayor and search for a way to stop it.

title_text: A Bailout for These Beastmen! - P5
summary_text: The party heads deep into the snowy woods in search of the Sage of the Forest. Will their mission succeed?

title_text: A Bailout for These Beastmen! - P6
summary_text: Squall is famous for being in a bad mood when roused from his slumber. The party is about to experience the mayor's warning firsthand!

title_text: An End for This Cold Snap! - P1
summary_text: The party learns of the problem's source from Squall, but can they stop the cold wave in time?

title_text: An End for This Cold Snap! - P2
summary_text: Darkness and Cielo set out on a mission to seize a magic item from a corrupt nobleman that can bring a stop to the cold wave.

title_text: An End for This Cold Snap! - P3
summary_text: The pair's negotiations fail, and the enraged nobleman hides the item, causing the group to turn to Melissa and Chris for help.

title_text: An End for This Cold Snap! - P4
summary_text: Kazuma, Chris, Melissa, and Squall form a team to pull off an elaborate heist at the nobleman's manor.

title_text: An End for This Cold Snap! - P5
summary_text: The team finds the magic item at last, but Squall's weakness alerts the manor to their presence.

title_text: An End for This Cold Snap! - P6
summary_text: With the relic in hand, the party is ready to stop the cold wave, but a lone girl stands in their way...

title_text: A Friend for This Lonely Spirit! - P1
summary_text: After the lightning spirit Mel appears, Kazuma attacks with his magic item, triggering an avalanche which buries him alive.

title_text: A Friend for This Lonely Spirit! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma, risking life and limb, puts an end to the cold snap. But Mel appears dissatisfied, so the group decides to hear her out.

title_text: A Friend for This Lonely Spirit! - P3
summary_text: With the help of Squall, Kazuma and the others end up looking after Mel. To their dismay, she proves to be quite the handful!

title_text: A Friend for This Lonely Spirit! - P4
summary_text: Mel and her mischief have completely worn out Kazuma and company. They decide to accept a quest as a change of pace.

title_text: A Friend for This Lonely Spirit! - P5
summary_text: Everyone is even more disordered than usual. Compounded with Mel's behavior, Kazuma quickly snaps.

title_text: A Friend for This Lonely Spirit! - P6
summary_text: Mel rushes into battle. But Kazuma steps in with his silver tongue when her foe turns out to be impervious to normal attacks.

title_text: A Shop for Samuidoh's Crops! - P1
summary_text: Daniel and Charlie appear at Mel's cabin. Mel confronts them, suspicious of what they are up to.

title_text: A Shop for Samuidoh's Crops! - P2
summary_text: Mel lends a hand as Kazuma and company pack up Samuidoh's vegetables for delivery across the country. Will her first job go smoothly?

title_text: A Shop for Samuidoh's Crops! - P3
summary_text: Kazuma opens a cafe that serves Samuidoh's veggies, but when you're working with Aqua and the rest of their party, nothing goes according to plan.

title_text: A Shop for Samuidoh's Crops! - P4
summary_text: After numerous complications, Kazuma devises a new plan using Mia and the other beastmen. Will the cafe survive?

title_text: A Shop for Samuidoh's Crops! - P5
summary_text: The beastman cafe is growing in popularity. However, one new part-timer is about to cause a bit of a stir.

title_text: A Shop for Samuidoh's Crops! - P6
summary_text: The giant corn Mia snuck in goes on a rampage with unexpected ferocity! How will Mel react to this veggie threat?!

title_text: A Settlement for This Stubborn Noble! - P1
summary_text: Cielo returns home, only to receive strict instructions from her father, Lord Reuentahl. Meanwhile, the other two members of Axel Hearts...

title_text: A Settlement for This Stubborn Noble! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma returns from a quest to be met by Lia and the others. Worried that they have not heard from Cielo, they set out to find her.

title_text: A Settlement for This Stubborn Noble! - P3
summary_text: Arriving at Cielo's family estate, Kazuma and company are escorted inside, where an unusually grave Cielo explains the situation.

title_text: A Settlement for This Stubborn Noble! - P4
summary_text: With the issue between Cielo and her family in the air, another problem arises. Unable to overlook Mel's offensive behavior, Squall starts telling a story.

title_text: A Settlement for This Stubborn Noble! - P5
summary_text: Hoping to get Axel Hearts back on track, Kazuma and company organize a signing event. A few days later, a letter arrives from someone in Lord Reuentahl's service.

title_text: A Settlement for This Stubborn Noble! - P6
summary_text: Kazuma and company finally bring Mel back to her senses. Now they wait in front of a confused crowd as parent and child speak.

title_text: True Pals for This Prankster Spirit! - P1
summary_text: Mel is up to her usual tricks, which has Squall on guard. In other news, trolls are spotted in Axel.

title_text: True Pals for This Prankster Spirit! - P2
summary_text: Yunyun seeks out Mel after uncovering Squall's plot to seal her away...but it looks like Daniel and Charlie are one step ahead of them.

title_text: True Pals for This Prankster Spirit! - P3
summary_text: Kazuma and company visit the orphanage looking for Mel, only to hear from the orphans that she left with Dust.

title_text: True Pals for This Prankster Spirit! - P4
summary_text: On the outskirts of town, Mel and Dust can be heard fighting in the woods. Kazuma and company rush to intervene but may have jumped the gun...

title_text: True Pals for This Prankster Spirit! - P5
summary_text: It seems Dust and Mel actually get along quite well. However, Squall still attempts to seal Mel away, pitting him against Kazuma and the others.

title_text: True Pals for This Prankster Spirit! - P6
summary_text: Seeing everyone on good terms with Mel makes Squall reconsider his beliefs about her. Suddenly, Daniel and Charlie appear...but to what end?

title_text: Friendship for This Lonely Spirit! - P1
summary_text: Upon realizing the true meaning of friendship, Mel sets off around town to make up for her past misdeeds.

title_text: Friendship for This Lonely Spirit! - P2
summary_text: Mel lends a hand on Chris's quest, but several chances to cause mischief cause her to realize that being good is not as easy as she thought.

title_text: Friendship for This Lonely Spirit! - P3
summary_text: Mel works an Axel Hearts fan meet-and-greet, but dreams of causing mischief. Elsewhere, the trolls are on the move...

title_text: Friendship for This Lonely Spirit! - P4
summary_text: Daniel convinces Mel that no one truly thinks of her as a friend. With a lie detector in hand, she visits her "friends" to find out the truth.

title_text: Friendship for This Lonely Spirit! - P5
summary_text: Daniel turns on the charm with Mel, who is dejected after discovering her friends were lying. Just then, someone wise in such matters makes a timely appearance.

title_text: Friendship for This Lonely Spirit! - P6
summary_text: After driving off the crass trolls, Mel learns how Kazuma and the others truly feel about her.

title_text: A Play Starring This Unlucky Yet Fortunate Hero! - P1
summary_text: Mel spends her days in happiness, no longer refraining from her pranks. However, her mentor Kazuma is not very popular with the locals...

title_text: A Play Starring This Unlucky Yet Fortunate Hero! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma moves to dispel the locals' false impression of him: that he is using Mel to further his own mischievous ends.

title_text: A Play Starring This Unlucky Yet Fortunate Hero! - P3
summary_text: Kazuma is busy restoring his good name when he's asked to host a celebration at the guild. Luna convinces him to put on a play, but...

title_text: A Play Starring This Unlucky Yet Fortunate Hero! - P4
summary_text: Kazuma's friends are given roles in the play, but no one likes their characters. Drawing straws looks like the only solution...

title_text: A Play Starring This Unlucky Yet Fortunate Hero! - P5
summary_text: Wiz is chosen as the heroine of the play, while Kazuma is the hero. The stage is set, the players are ready, and the curtain rises!

title_text: A Play Starring This Unlucky Yet Fortunate Hero! - P6
summary_text: Squall freaks out upon seeing a bug, which threatens to ruin the play until Mel appears to calm everyone with a song.

title_text: Daily Life with This Stormy Spirit! - P1
summary_text: In order to adjust to life in Axel, Squall and Mel pick up some work from Kazuma, and things look to be working out when...

title_text: Daily Life with This Stormy Spirit! - P2
summary_text: Mel makes an appearance at an Axel Hearts concert. Her dancing garners much attention, but someone in the audience desires her power for himself...

title_text: Daily Life with This Stormy Spirit! - P3
summary_text: Basking in the glory of her performance, Mel receives a mysterious request. She sets out with Kazuma and company to the hot springs when...

title_text: Daily Life with This Stormy Spirit! - P4
summary_text: Kazuma proposes Melissa join their quest and hot spring trip. Upon entering the springs, Mel tries out one of Kazuma's lessons.

title_text: Daily Life with This Stormy Spirit! - P5
summary_text: Melissa foils Kazuma's plot to peek on the girls at the hot springs. Mel blows her top after her friends are hurt during the quest.

title_text: Daily Life with This Stormy Spirit! - P6
summary_text: Kazuma and company are at the mercy of Mel's lightning when two trolls in possession of a strange magical item appear...

title_text: God's Blessing on This Fabulous Friendship! - P1
summary_text: Kazuma and the others are worried about the newly powerless Mel. Meanwhile, the transformed Charlie goes on a rampage outside of town.

title_text: God's Blessing on This Fabulous Friendship! - P2
summary_text: Mel wakes up, likely due to the others' concern for her. The group put their heads together to find a way to restore her magic power.

title_text: God's Blessing on This Fabulous Friendship! - P3
summary_text: Charlie and Daniel, flush with Mel's stolen magic power, sneak into town...but are thwarted by the sudden appearance of Iris.

title_text: God's Blessing on This Fabulous Friendship! - P4
summary_text: Squall can barely catch his breath as he explains how Mel set off for Daniel's castle alone. The group rushes to her aid.

title_text: God's Blessing on This Fabulous Friendship! - P5
summary_text: Mel attempts to retrieve her magic power from Charlie on her own, but is swiftly sent packing. Luckily, Yunyun comes to the rescue.

title_text: God's Blessing on This Fabulous Friendship! - P6
summary_text: Kazuma's strategy and the group's efforts restore Mel's magic power. Mel then calls upon her lightning to end Daniel's scheme.

title_text: A Wonderful Show for these New Friends! - P1
summary_text: Kazuma and are fed up with the extreme nature of Mel's pranks. One day, Kazuma receives a visitor from the capital.

title_text: A Wonderful Show for these New Friends! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma and company are unable to prevent Mel from playing a prank on Iris, causing Claire to fly into a rage!

title_text: A Wonderful Show for these New Friends! - P3
summary_text: Claire, hearing of Mel's villainous turn, sets out after her. Meanwhile, Iris reveals to Kazuma the other reason she came to Axel.

title_text: A Wonderful Show for These New Friends! - P4
summary_text: Iris wants to see a show in Axel. Kazuma and company attempt to resolve the conflict between Claire and Mel, but...

title_text: A Wonderful Show for These New Friends! - P5
summary_text: Mel receives a request from Axel Hearts to appear in their concert. The lightning spirit's voice continues to enthrall the fans!

title_text: A Wonderful Show for These New Friends! - P6
summary_text: Daniel and Charlie must be defeated to ensure the show goes off without a hitch. The dancers, a lightning spirit, and the princess are all eager to perform!

title_text: A Magic Item for This Amnesiac Princess! P1
summary_text: Kazuma gained popularity in Axel after defeating Daniel and Charlie. As he was basking in the glory, Kazuma ran into a very excited Dust on his way to meet the new girl at the Succubus Shop.

title_text: A Magic Item for This Amnesiac Princess! P2
summary_text: On the night he was meant to dream with Carla, Kazuma found himself tempted by a cornucopia of festive cuisine! Meanwhile, a mysterious figure searched for him from the shadows...

title_text: A Magic Item for This Amnesiac Princess! P3
summary_text: Lead by a determined Claire, Kazuma and company arrived in the capital. There, they met Iris, but something about her seemed off...

title_text: A Magic Item for This Amnesiac Princess! P4
summary_text: Hoping to find a way to restore Iris's memories, Kazuma and the others searched the castle archives for clues. Just when they were ready to give up, Megumin found answers in an unexpected book.

title_text: A Magic Item for This Amnesiac Princess! P5
summary_text: Kazuma and the others ended up making their way toward the Brake in search of a magic item to restore Iris's memories. But on the way, her identity was nearly exposed, and the group realized she would need an alias.

title_text: A Magic Item for This Amnesiac Princess! P6
summary_text: After defeating the golem, the group finally managed to arrive in Brake and attempted to meet the magic item researcher Megumin's father told them about. However, things were never as easy as they seemed.

title_text: Negotiations with This Magic Item Researcher! P1
summary_text: After a chaotic first encounter with Shelly, Kazuma and company were thrilled to see the magic item. However, negotiations come to a screeching halt until Iris proposes her own solution.

title_text: Negotiations with This Magic Item Researcher! P2
summary_text: To earn enough money to purchase the magic item that could restore her memories, Lilsis, AKA Iris, began working a part-time job. Iris excelled due to her outstanding work ethic, until a certain knight appeared...

title_text: Negotiations with This Magic Item Researcher! P3
summary_text: Kazuma is thoroughly scolded by Claire for allowing the princess to work. Trying to find a solution to their problem, Kazuma approached the master of negotiations, Vanir, for advice on how to strike a better deal with Shelly.

title_text: Negotiations with This Magic Item Researcher! P4
summary_text: When Kazuma returned to Brake to renegotiate with Shelly. But while in her laboratory, he discovered a rather peculiar book penned by the researcher herself.

title_text: Negotiations with This Magic Item Researcher! P5
summary_text: Kazuma and friends agreed to defeat a golem causing Shelly trouble in exchange for the magic item. After an unfruitful day of searching, the group settled down to dinner, much to Iris's delight.

title_text: Negotiations with This Magic Item Researcher! P6
summary_text: Just when Kazuma was about to meet his end at the hands of his golem, Iris sprang into action to save the day.

title_text: The Mystery of This Magic Item's Whereabouts! P1
summary_text: The golems ransacked Shelly's estate and stole the memory restoration magic item. With the situation dire, Kazuma and company begun brainstorming a plan to recover the stolen item.

title_text: The Mystery of This Magic Item's Whereabouts! P2
summary_text: Melissa agreed to help them find the magic item, as long as she's rewarded. Meanwhile, Kazuma and the others held a rambunctious party to welcome Shelly to Axel.

title_text: The Mystery of This Magic Item's Whereabouts! P3
summary_text: With the possibility of recovering the stolen magic item in sight, the group met to come up with a battle plan. Kazuma headed to the local inn where Shelly was staying to invite her, but...

title_text: The Mystery of This Magic Item's Whereabouts! P4
summary_text: Claire showed up with the requested money, only to find Kazuma and the rest running off to the ruins where the golems resided.

title_text: The Mystery of This Magic Item's Whereabouts! P5
summary_text: Kazuma and friends made their way through the ruins and managed to crack the code to the locked the door. Now, completing their mission was as simple as grabbing the item...or was it?

title_text: The Mystery of This Magic Item's Whereabouts! P6
summary_text: After the golem attacked them, the group defeated it and successfully retrieved the magic item. Just as they were about to celebrate, the golem begun a self-destruct sequence.

title_text: Some Ore for This Broken Magic Item! P1
summary_text: Kazuma and friends dug the magic item out of the rubble of the collapsed ruins. At last, they are relieved to have completed their goal, only to find the item was damaged during the explosion.

title_text: Some Ore for This Broken Magic Item! P2
summary_text: Kazuma and friends needed to acquire a rare ore to fix the broken magic item. They struck a deal with Vanir to gather the information on the dungeon containing the materials they needed.

title_text: Some Ore for This Broken Magic Item! P3
summary_text: When the malenium proved difficult to find, Kazuma and friends had begun to lose hope in their quest. But suddenly, the found out that the very ore they needed was being given away as a prize at the upcoming Showtime Sing-Off.

title_text: Some Ore for This Broken Magic Item! P4
summary_text: The group was determined to win the contest and get the malenium. Shelly joined the group, and they all practiced their performance together.

title_text: Some Ore for This Broken Magic Item! P5
summary_text: All of the practice paid off when Kazuma and friends win the malenium they so desperately needed. The repair of the magic item was a success—will Iris finally recover her memories?

title_text: Some Ore for This Broken Magic Item! P6
summary_text: After defeating the intruding golem, it was finally time for Iris to use the magic item to restore her lost memories. Upon doing so, a strange light enveloped her body.

title_text: Admiration for This Decisive Princess! P1
summary_text: With the magic item failing to restore Iris's memories, Kazuma suggested it was time to reveal her amnesia to the public. However, they were suddenly attacked.

title_text: Admiration for This Decisive Princess! P2
summary_text: Kazuma and the others struggled as they tried to thwart a fierce attack on the capital by the golems. Claire and Rain showed up to lend a hand, but eventually was forced to retreat to the castle.

title_text: Admiration for This Decisive Princess! P3
summary_text: Kazuma and the others raced to the city gates, where they caught sight of Daniel and Charlie, golems in tow.

title_text: Admiration for This Decisive Princess! P4
summary_text: Kazuma and the others made their way back to the castle to come up with a plan to defeat the golems. However, their assailants were relentless.

title_text: Admiration for This Decisive Princess! P5
summary_text: Iris prepared to make an appearance before the people, but she seemed preoccupied the entire time. That's when Rain presented her with a certain item.

title_text: Admiration for This Decisive Princess! P6
summary_text: With the help of Iris, they somehow managed to defeat Daniel and Charlie. Just as everyone breathed a collective sigh of relief, something else unexpected happened...

title_text: A Promise with this Exotic Succubus! - P1
summary_text: Now that Iris has regained her memories, now's the time for succubus dream world! Kazuma was rushing in excitement to the café...

title_text: A Promise with this Exotic Succubus! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma's party are greeted by Iris and Sherry upon arriving at the city. The strange atmosphere seems to be due to a promise that they made.

title_text: A Promise with this Exotic Succubus! - P3
summary_text: Kazuma and the others are having a meal together. However, they did not know that something not human was approaching the city.

title_text: A Promise with this Exotic Succubus! - P4
summary_text: Kazuma just remembered that he forgot to keep his promise with Carla once again. But it was too late. The angry succubus arrived at the city…!

title_text: A Promise with this Exotic Succubus! - P5
summary_text: Kazuma visits the succubus café with Dust. But Carla couldn't hide her anger when she sees that Kazuma isn't choosing her.

title_text: A Promise with this Exotic Succubus! - P6
summary_text: Kazuma and his friends confront Carla with the help of Mitsurugi who's half forced-in to the battle. Calm Carla's anger by standing against her fierce attacks!

title_text: An Approach to this Masked Devil! - P1
summary_text: Kazuma and co learn that Carla has feelings for Vanir and talk to her about it. They all try their best to think about Vanir.

title_text: An Approach to this Masked Devil! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma's party follow Vanir around to find out what Vanir likes. After their investigation, Dust comes up with an answer…

title_text: An Approach to this Masked Devil! - P3
summary_text: Vanir likes masochists… Having taken Dust's advice, Carla tries approaching Vanir…

title_text: An Approach to this Masked Devil! - P4
summary_text: As Carla continued to work hard for Vanir's attention, she began making more mistakes at work. As her superior, Lolisa decides to have a word with Carla….

title_text: An Approach to this Masked Devil! - P5
summary_text: With Sherry's help, Carla and the others sneak in a high level dungeon to give Vanir a secret gift.

title_text: An Approach to this Masked Devil! - P6
summary_text: Carla and the party defeat the bats with difficulty and move on further into the dungeon only to find an unexpected figure waiting inside…!

title_text: A New Store at this Beginner's Town! - P1
summary_text: A few days after Carla was fired from the succubus café, Kazuma received a letter from an unknown writer.

title_text: A New Store at this Beginner's Town! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma and Dust have a discussion about the fee demanded by Carla. They decide to find another solution rather than keep paying her.

title_text: A New Store at this Beginner's Town! - P3
summary_text: A new store, apart from the Guild restaurant and the succubus café is founded in this town! Carla and her friends start working at the new store.

title_text: A New Store at this Beginner's Town! - P4
summary_text: As sales increase, Kazuma and co are seeking to expand their business. Other people almost found about this store, but they want to run to business smoothly…

title_text: A New Store at this Beginner's Town! - P5
summary_text: Lolisa finds out about the new rival store and due to concerns about marketing threat, becomes violent upon visiting! Carla and Lolisa begin a succubus's fight…

title_text: A New Store at this Beginner's Town! - P6
summary_text: Carla is infuriated by Lolisa's complaints. Despite Kazuma's efforts to comfort her, a new trouble comes up.

title_text: A Clue for this Heartbroken Succubus! - P1
summary_text: Carla left Kazuma and his friends behind claiming that she would become the queen of succubi. Having heard the news, Lolisa's eyes become shadowed with concern.

title_text: A Clue for this Heartbroken Succubus! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma has been busy with the business recently, but he regains his spirits to head out on a quest! He sets off towards the Crimson Demon Village!

title_text: A Clue for this Heartbroken Succubus! - P3
summary_text: Kazuma received reports that the Crimson Demon Village is under attack by succubi, feels threatened and tries to leave the town…

title_text: A Clue for this Heartbroken Succubus! - P4
summary_text: Feeling endangered, Kazuma quickly returns to Axel. He listens to the story of te Queen of sucubi from Lolisa again.

title_text: A Clue for this Heartbroken Succubus! - P5
summary_text: Brake is under attack by succubus... To prevent damage from spreading, Kazuma and his friends rush to the scene.

title_text: A Clue for this Heartbroken Succubus! - P6
summary_text: In order to prevent Carla from being the queen of succubi, Kazuma makes an remarkable performance. Huh…? That Kazuma being remarkable...?

title_text: A Final Showdown with this Succubus Queen! - P1
summary_text: Carla eventually becomes the succubus queen. Her whip attacks Brake! Aqua and the others sense the trouble and rush to the scene...

title_text: A Final Showdown with this Succubus Queen! - P2
summary_text: Carla's next target is Axel Town. In the shortage of fighters, a certain figure appears! Meanwhile, Dust seems to be concerned about something else.

title_text: A Final Showdown with this Succubus Queen! - P3
summary_text: Kazuma and Dust visit the succubus café. They were supposed to ask Lolisa about Carla… but the converstaion takes an unexpected turn!?

title_text: A Final Showdown with this Succubus Queen! - P4
summary_text: The decision to negoticate peace with the succubus queen or not begins!

title_text: A Final Showdown with this Succubus Queen! - P5
summary_text: Negotiation or battle… The decision rests on the final battle, a horse race! But is it really okay to spend time like this…?

title_text: A Final Showdown with this Succubus Queen! - P6
summary_text: The adventurers of Axel struggle against Carla's secret weapon, then an unexpected figure who is unaffected by demon powers show their extraordinary strength!?

title_text: Recovering this Worst Reputation! -P1
summary_text: Kazuma and Dust are under fire of the women of Axel. It was because they defended a succubus...

title_text: Recovering this Worst Reputation! -P2
summary_text: But the criticism toward Kazuma and Dust grew worse. Tonight, these two aren't even able to find food to eat.

title_text: Recovering this Worst Reputation! -P3
summary_text: Eventually, Kazuma and Dust raise a toast with water. However, their reputation among the male adventurers couldn’t get any better...

title_text: Recovering this Worst Reputation! -P4
summary_text: After cheering up from the shop, Kazuma returns to the estate. However, it just so happens that his party members prepared a feast.

title_text: Recovering this Worst Reputation! -P5
summary_text: Kazuma and Dust left to investigate a ruin to help Shelly. Could they make it back safely?

title_text: Recovering this Worst Reputation! -P6
summary_text: Kazuma and the others were able to get out of the pinch thanks to his party members rushing over to help them. But the women accepting the apology seem very friendly...

title_text: Bringing Common Sense to This Strange Race! - P1
summary_text: Kazuma was sick and tired with it. Crimson Demons, debt, and difficult quests... Someone was listening to his grieving heart...

title_text: Bringing Common Sense to This Strange Race! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma’s party were struggling through a dungeon. Kazuma, who was having a hard time just as he usually does, coincidentally discovers a mysterious O-Jizo.

title_text: Bringing Common Sense to This Strange Race! - P3
summary_text: The letter from the Crimson Demon chief was surprising. Kazuma’s party along with the flustered Yunyun and Megumin quickly headed over to the village...

title_text: Bringing Common Sense to This Strange Race! - P4
summary_text: Kazuma’s party were shocked at the completely “rational” Crimson Demons. Furthermore, there was another loud commotion near the school...

title_text: Bringing Common Sense to This Strange Race! - P5
summary_text: Kazuma’s party witnessed Funifura and Dodonko fighting. The incidence of the Crimson Demon Village still needed to be resolved...

title_text: Bringing Common Sense to This Strange Race! - P6
summary_text: After rescuing Komekko from a monster attack, Kazuma’s party discuss to come up with a solution with Yunyun and Funifura...

title_text: Recovery on This Changed Relationship! - P1
summary_text: The party looks for the cause behind the Crimson Demon. The normal Funifura bolts out by herself saying that she was going to fix Dodonko.

title_text: Recovery on This Changed Relationship! - P2
summary_text: Funifura tries to fix Dodonko by hitting her head. They finally stop her, and try to jog her memories back with objects that hold memories but...

title_text: Recovery on This Changed Relationship! - P3
summary_text: While discussion in Wiz's Shop, Shelly provides some useful information. It was about the existence of an Item that reverses one’s personality.

title_text: Recovery on This Changed Relationship! - P4
summary_text: No matter how hard they look for it, the Item is nowhere to be found. The Crimson Demons are starting to become more ordinary. The party heads to the final ruins with desperate hearts.

title_text: Recovery on This Changed Relationship! - P5
summary_text: Dodonko and Funifura are still fighting within the ruins. As they advance forward, the monsters and a treasure chest are found. The party fights for the Crimson Demons.

title_text: Recovery on This Changed Relationship! - P6
summary_text: Even after they used the discovered magic item, not only was it ineffective on Dodonko, but it also broke. When they thought they were at a complete dead end...

title_text: New Jobs for This Normal Race! - P1
summary_text: Kazuma's party is mortified that they couldn’t return Dodonko back to normal. The True Crimson Demons started the “purge” in the Village.

title_text: New Jobs for This Normal Race! - P2
summary_text: Red Prison, which was turned into a normal school by the True Crimson Demons. Megumin is discouraged after seeing the completely-changed learning facility.

title_text: New Jobs for This Normal Race! - P3
summary_text: Kazuma tries to restore the relationship between Megumin and Arue. Arue suggests something unexpected as the condition for restoring their relationship.

title_text: New Jobs for This Normal Race! - P4
summary_text: Kazuma ends up going on a date with the girls to restore their relationship with Megumin. Although, Kazuma was far from selfless...

title_text: New Jobs for This Normal Race! - P5
summary_text: Kazuma fulfilled his desires by laying down on her lap while being fed. However, it didn't last long.

title_text: New Jobs for This Normal Race! - P6
summary_text: Arue and Dodonko revealed Kazuma's shameful conduct. On the other hand, Shelly continues to investigate this case.

title_text: The Chaos with This Dangerous Spirit! - P1
summary_text: Shelly reported back to the party. As the information about O-Jizo unfolds, Kazuma’s complexion gets worse...

title_text: The Chaos with This Dangerous Spirit! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma is feeling guilty towards the information on O-Jizo. On the other hand, Crimson Demons were battling the True Crimson Demons inside the village.

title_text: The Chaos with This Dangerous Spirit! - P3
summary_text: More and more is becoming a True Crimson Demon. Megumin, who joined Kazuma, tells him a secret story.

title_text: The Chaos with This Dangerous Spirit! - P4
summary_text: Eventually, even Komekko ended up changing. Kazuma and Megumin keep searching the village and the others leave to investigate.

title_text: The Chaos with This Dangerous Spirit! - P5
summary_text: While the village's tourist industry continues, an army of monsters attack. At the same time, Aqua’s party comes running saying that they know the O-Jizo’s location.

title_text: The Chaos with This Dangerous Spirit! - P6
summary_text: Kazuma’s party successfully defeated the monsters. Afterward, O-Jizo reveals itself and unleashes its true powers...

title_text: Cheers to This Crimson Demon’s Pride! - P1
summary_text: The party heads to Axel to look for O-Jizo. Although, they have made a decision to stop the damage from spreading any further...

title_text: Cheers to This Crimson Demon’s Pride! - P2
summary_text: The streets were already damaged. With the help of Mel and Dust, Kazuma’s party goes after the O-Jizo’s traces.

title_text: Cheers to This Crimson Demon’s Pride! - P3
summary_text: They finally find O-Jizo after Mitsurugi joins. As a Spirit, Mel couldn’t hide her anger.

title_text: Cheers to This Crimson Demon’s Pride! - P4
summary_text: Kazuma and Mitsurugi successfully defeated the orc. After feeling a great quake on the streets outside, they quickly head over.

title_text: Cheers to This Crimson Demon’s Pride! - P5
summary_text: Mel and O-Jizo are battling fiercely. Megumin is about to join Mel, but something happens...

title_text: Cheers to This Crimson Demon’s Pride! - P6
summary_text: With everyone’s powers, they seal O-Jizo. Megumin aims her staff to return the Crimson Demons back to normal, and to punish O-Jizo...

title_text: Happy Moments with these Crimson Demon Girls! - P1
summary_text: Not only did Kazuma's wish not come true, but he also ends up having to pay for damages. So Dust takes him to the shop to cheer him up.

title_text: Happy Moments with these Crimson Demon Girls! - P2
summary_text: Before he realizes, Kazuma is surrounded by Crimson Demon girls. He enjoys a moment in his dream with a big smile.

title_text: Happy Moments with these Crimson Demon Girls! - P3
summary_text: Kazuma goes on a quest with Megumin in the name of dating, and is thrilled to be treated like a hero by the Crimson Demons.

title_text: Happy Moments with these Crimson Demon Girls! - P4
summary_text: With his desire gradually deepening, Kazuma ends up living together with the Crimson Demon girls. However, such sweet times came to an end.

title_text: Happy Moments with these Crimson Demon Girls! - P5
summary_text: The party goes to check on the village. After seeing how the Crimson Demons returned back to normal, they decide to relax and look around.

title_text: Happy Moments with these Crimson Demon Girls! - P6
summary_text: The Crimson Demons trample on the goblins with awesomeness as a priority. Reassured by the usual scenery, a banquet is held afterward.

title_text: A Departure for These Axel's Dancers! - P1
summary_text: Kazuma's party, clad in legendary attire, is ready for a fresh start. A new adventure begins…?

title_text: A Departure for These Axel's Dancers! - P2
summary_text: Kazuma, who has decided to live as the producer of Axel Hearts, hears rumors of the group's disbandment.

title_text: A Departure for These Axel's Dancers! - P3
summary_text: Lia, scouted by the Oute Opera Company, leaves Kazuma trying to win her favor to prevent her departure…

title_text: A Departure for These Axel's Dancers! - P4
summary_text: Cielo steps down temporarily due to family matters, so Lia and Erica put on a show as a duo. However, they hear an unexpected story from fans at the venue.

title_text: A Departure for These Axel's Dancers! - P5
summary_text: Erica's longing to meet her parents grows stronger day by day. As the three struggle, a certain dancer fanboy invades Axel.

title_text: A Departure for These Axel's Dancers! - P6
summary_text: The opera company director repels Daniel and try scouts Lia once again. Lia’s feelings waver as she contemplates the company director’s wishes—what conclusion will she reach?

title_text: The Ending for This Wonderful World! - P1
summary_text: Lia declares, "I'll join the opera company." Kazuma desperately tries to stop her. He can't afford to let go of his money-making tree...

title_text: The Ending for This Wonderful World! - P2
summary_text: Erika says she’s going to visit her family. Cielo is also busy helping at home. While each of them finds a new goal, what will Kazuma do...?

title_text: The Ending for This Wonderful World! - P3
summary_text: Without Cielo and Erika, the stage suddenly looks much larger. As she reminisces, Lia recalls the shows from the past.

title_text: The Ending for This Wonderful World! - P4
summary_text: Cielo stands in for her father to greet the members of high society. Shaking hands with the nobles, she thinks, "It’s because of those days that I can do this now."

title_text: The Ending for This Wonderful World! - P5
summary_text: With thoughts of her parents close to her heart, Erika rides the carriage. During her journey, she meets a girl who is a fan of Axel Hearts.

title_text: The Ending for This Wonderful World! - P6
summary_text: Daniel directs his anger over the disbanding of Axel Hearts at Kazuma. Kazuma also faces questioning from the surrounding adventurers about the reasons for the disbanding.

title_text: Curtain Falls with These Adventurers of Axel! - P1
summary_text: To defeat Daniel and his followers, Iris, the Crimson Demons, and the Beastman join forces. Clad in legendary outfits, the final battle begins...

title_text: Curtain Falls with These Adventurers of Axel! - P2
summary_text: Near the royal capital, Iris and her party fight with monsters. In the streets of Break, Wiz and her party wage their own battles. Meanwhile, what is Erika up to...?

title_text: Curtain Falls with These Adventurers of Axel! - P3
summary_text: In Samidou, Mitsurugi and his party fight on. In Arcanretia, Dust and his companions take up arms. And at the same time, what is Cielo doing...?

title_text: Curtain Falls with These Adventurers of Axel! - P4
summary_text: Suppressing the rampaging monsters in various places, Kazuma and his party storm Daniel’s castle. Using the last of his power, Daniel undergoes a monstrous transformation.

title_text: Curtain Falls with These Adventurers of Axel! - P5
summary_text: Kazuma and his party engage in battle against the mighty Fantastic Daniel. Just as they’re pushed to the brink, who should appear but...?

title_text: Curtain Falls with These Adventurers of Axel! - P6
summary_text: The Axel Hearts face off against Daniel. Their struggle is broadcast across the land, and the cheers of fans everywhere spark a miracle...!

title_text: <size=26>God's Blessing on These Fantastic Days!</size>
summary_text: A show commemorating the reunion of Axel Hearts has begun. As everyone eagerly awaits, what song Axel Hearts will perform is...?
